This tutorial on "Building functions" was built for a workshop [R-Ladies Vancouver](https://twitter.com/RLadiesVan?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor) 


## Objectives

In this short tutorial learners will understand:

* What functions are and how to use them
* Why custom functions are useful and when we might need them
* How to build your own basic and complex functions

### What are functions?

testing <- 1+1
print(testing)
